text:
[Verse]
Walking through the city
Neon lights so pretty
Heart beats with the rhythm
Lost in this prism

[Verse 2]
Voices in the night
Echoes in the light
Dreams float on the breeze
Time's frozen in these

[Chorus]
City lights shine bright
Guide me through the night
Feel the magic
Feel the glow
In this city's endless flow

[Verse 3]
Shadows dance around
Feet lift off the ground
Stars sprinkled high
In the urban sky

[Bridge]
Lost but feeling free
Here's where I wanna be
No map no need to see
Just this city and me

[Chorus]
City lights shine bright
Guide me through the night
Feel the magic
Feel the glow
In this city's endless flow
title: City Lights
